P&D services: Fluoride Treatments (Frequency limitations apply);Space
Maintainers;Exams;Cleanings;Bitewing X-Rays;Full Mouth X-Rays
Basic services: Fillings;Simple Extractions;Root Canals (Anterior/Bicuspid);Non-Surgical
Periodontics;Periodontal Maintenance;Cone Beam Radiographs
Major services: Crowns & Gold Restorations;Bridgework;Full & Partial Dentures;Repair of
Dentures;Oral Surgery;Root Canals (Molar);Surgical Periodontics
With the Delta Dental PPO Plus Premier program, members utilizing Delta Dental PPO or Delta Dental Premier
coverage of the Premier network, Delta Dental PPO Plus Premier groups average in-network utilization ranging
from 85-90%.
Claims for non-participating dentists will be reimbursed up to Delta Dental's maximum allowable charges.
The benefits outlined above are a summary of the quoted plan design. Full details on the plan of benefits and applicable policy provisions, including limitations
and exclusions, are provided in the group contract.
The quoted plan includes Delta Dental's Carryover Maximum benefit.
2025-02-18_NBQ-92269
Dependent children are covered to age 26.
The quoted plan includes Delta Dental's Integrated Oral Health benefit.
The quoted plan includes Delta Dental's Oral Health Enhancement benefit.
Delta Dental of New Jersey, Inc.
